sentences.sentence: One of the museum exhibits is this underground magnet antenna from the Bita cryptographic hardware.
sentences.translation: 博物馆的展馆之一是来自于 Bita 加密硬件的地下磁铁天线。

sentences.sentence: I first discovered the Napoleonic cryptographic battle a few years ago when I was reading Sir Charles Oman's epic History of the Peninsular War.
sentences.translation: 几年前，我在阅读查尔斯·奥曼爵士的恢弘巨著《半岛战争史》时，第一次发现了拿破仑时期的密码战。

sentences.sentence: This handshake produces the cryptographic parameters of the session.
sentences.translation: 此次握手将生成会话的加密参数。
